title: The New Adventures of the Avengers

sources.title: The New Adventures of the Avengers
sources.description:
First part of the trilogy (The Elusive Avengers) is also available on our channel: https://youtu.be/Vl0uzTY0M9Y

The Crown of Russian Empire, Part One: https://youtu.be/8v-UtmTahjQ
The Crown of Russian Empire, Part Two: https://youtu.be/pjZISgiuBvI

The young heroes of the film - the "elusive avengers" Danka, Valerka, Yashka and Ksanka - are now fighters of Budyonny's cavalry army. One day, young scouts are sent on an important mission: they must get a map of the White fortified area from the safe of the head of the White Guard counterintelligence. But when they are already close to completing the task, the old enemy of the guys Ataman Burnash will appear in the city, who will recognize Danka and want to take revenge...

Year of production: 1968

Director: Keosayan Edmond
Writers: Keosayan Edmond, Makarov Artur
Composers: Yan Frenkel, Boris Mokrousov
Operator: Dobronravov Fedor
Production Designer: Vasily Golikov

Cast: Ivan Pereverzev, Savely Kramarov, Armen Dzhigarkhanyan, Sergey Filippov, Efim Kopelyan, Konstantin Sorokin, Vladimir Ivashov, Victor Kosykh, Vasily Vasily, Valentina Kurdyukova, Mikhail Metelkin, Arkady Tolbuzin, Boris Sichkin, Evgeniy Vesnik, Nikolai Fedortsov
